plot: After his wife Bonnie leaves, Donald Marshack struggles to raise their teenaged daughter Miranda with occasional help from his friends the Hoodenpyles.
plot_en: After his wife Bonnie leaves, Donald Marshack struggles to raise their teenaged daughter Miranda with occasional help from his friends the Hoodenpyles.
plot_es: After his wife Bonnie leaves, Donald Marshack struggles to raise their teenaged daughter Miranda with occasional help from his friends the Hoodenpyles.
title: Raising Miranda
